name: Diarreo Adventures
description:
Embark on an epic journey to cure your diarrhea and hemorrhoids.

The path will be full of dangers and enemies, but nothing is worse than having diarrhea and hemorrhoids at the same time.

Art by o_lobster: PIXEL ART METROIDVANIA ASSET PACK by o_lobster (itch.io)

Thanks o_lobster, without you this game would not have been possible.
